A "Smart Kitchen Gadget" that can automatically chop, dice, and mince vegetables based on the user's preferred texture and shape.
A "Food Waste Recycler" that turns discarded fruits and vegetables into compost in minutes.
A "Sustainable Cooking Companion" that provides personalized meal plans based on the user's dietary preferences and cooking skills.
A "Multifunctional Kitchen Tool" that combines several tools into one compact unit, such as a garlic press, grater, and peeler.
A "Cooking Coach" that uses machine learning algorithms to provide real-time feedback and suggestions during cooking.
